AnimalActivity About our animals About the species Gilor, our 22-year-old olive baboon was born in the deep forests of Brazil.
 Yossi used to run from poachers and because of that he is not very friendly.
 But you can bribe him with some bananas! Category: Killer Apes Series: M6 Family: Apes Distribution: South America Reproduction: 50,000 Food: BANANAS! YUMMM Type enclosure or animal Share on facebook Show on map GeneralInfoActivity
Contact Info Prices Opening Hours About Us We, at Be'er Sheva Zoo, are not here for money.
We are here to give.
To give you.
To give the animals.
To give to the environment.
Here, in Negev Zoo, we take care of animals that cannot go back to the wild. Ways To Contact Us: The times we are open: How little we charge:
